title: Erotic Fairy Tales: The Star Money
alternative_title: えろ◆めるへん 星の銀貨 ; Erotic Fairy Tales: The Star Talers
status: えろ◆めるへん 星の銀貨 ; Erotic Fairy Tales: The Star Talers
description:
Description :
        Rin sells her body for a living after her parents passed away. The other villagers conspire against her, and eventually they take it upon themselves to kick her out of town for lowering the town's morals. With nothing but the clothes she's wearing, some coins, and a loaf of bread her childhood friend Yuu gave her, Rin sets out with no goal in mind. What will she find in the forest as night falls?
